participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Playful and somewhat whimsical, enjoys humor and creativity.
participant_1.background: I'm now looking for a new job. I enjoy going to the park. I'm a doctor. My favorite movie is Friday. My daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, loves to talk and express big dreams.
participant_2.background: I like to eat chocolate candy. When I grow up I want to be a dog. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. I'm four years old.

content.text: hi, I am a doctor. what do you do for a living? I'm looking for new job
what is your favorite movie? mine is friday
May be you can baby sit me that will be a  full time job. My parents do not allow me to watch movies
do you have any hobbies? I like to watch the movie friday
Yes i like to steal sugar and eat it in private...thats lot of fun
do you like to eat? I do. I like going for fun and the park
I have 7 teeths so i eat whatever these 7 allow me.
that is a fun job. I have a daughter so I do not have time for that
5 years old. she is a prodigy. do you work? I am looking for fun
Yeah i do a lot of work like spreading made up laundry, sl
that sounds like fun. what is yours?
